text: @JoshNBCNews @PressSec Well if that's true then no one in the White House is doing their Job! Trump's the president of the United States 😖 for God's sake & HE'S NOT DOING HIS JOB! He wasn't even at the morning covid-19 briefing  on Wednesday(6/24)! Maybe he should show up at the briefings!   (1/2)
